summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6230 for the improvement of Pinehurst Way from 15th Ave. Northeast to 17th Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89335, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
